item.title: Kubectl - configuration
item.description: Kubectl client gives us possibility to configure and switch easy between multiple K8s clusters. Config files location for kubectl Main location for kubectl config files is $HOME/.kube, by default we have single config file named config: [node1 ~]$ cd $HOME/.kube [node1 .kube]$ ls -lah total 4.0K drwxr-xr-x 1 root root 37 Mar 12 20:48 . dr-xr-x--- 1 root root 19 Nov 29 11:46 .. drwxr-x--- 3 root root 23 Mar 12 20:48 cache lrwxrwxrwx 1 root root 26 Nov 29 11:46 config -> /etc/kubernetes/admin.
